RIDC Agenda for 9-15-2025

Check the Texas Economic Development website for information on locations, speakers and registration information for the , as well as additional events and webinars.

Economic Injury Disaster Loan 2023TX_17763_Fact_Sheet

How SBA Programs and Resources Can Help Start or Grow Your Business – Presentation

is a non-profit corporation aimed at providing economic development efforts in the City of Robstown. The corporation manages the 4B-Sales tax, and is governed by a Board of Directors consisting of seven board members and an Executive Director.

P O Box 872 Robstown, Texas 78380 Phone (361) 387-4589

Mayor David Martinez, Member

County Commissioner John Marez, Member

Roland Ramos, Member

Mary Ann Saenz, Member

Nelda Sanchez, Member

Cordelia Bosquez, Member

Omar Garcia, Member

Gabby Garcia, Executive Director

CONTACT
361-387-4589 361-387-6346

101 E. Main Street Robstown, Texas 78380

Monday – Friday 8:00 am – 5:00 pm
